main: ^I am the wise grand wizard, What brings you to my shop today?
^Do you have the spellbook of portals
^This witch said you would know something about a portal spellbook.
chosen_portal: ^Of course but why would a duck need a portal spellbook
^To get home.. This witch promised to help me
chosen_witch: ^Oh, that's interesting indeed. But I can't give the book to just anybody.
^Ok, but only if you promise me the book
^No way just give it to me
chosen_mayhem: ^I can't help you with that, I'm sorry.
^I was kidding, I need it to get back home
^I was joking, this witch promised to help me home
chosen_no: ^Okay, then you don't want the book.
^I need it I will answer your questions
^No I want it I will answer your riddles
chosen_ok: ^What is the hardest natural substance on Earth?
chosen_Q1Y: ^What are the three states of matter?
chosen_Q1N: ^What are the three states of matter?
chosen_Q2Y: ^What is the name of the process where water changes from liquid to gas?
chosen_Q2N: ^What is the name of the process where water changes from liquid to gas?
chosen_Q3Y: ^Who was the first woman to fly solo across the Atlantic Ocean?
chosen_Q3N: ^Ahh, close one. I tought you would know this.
^Who was the first woman to fly solo across the Atlantic Ocean?
chosen_Q4Y: ^Who was the third president of the United States?
chosen_Q4N: ^I'm disappointed, you should have known that.
^Who was the third president of the United States?
chosen_LastQY: ^You did well enough for my liking so I will give you this SPELLBOOK OF PORTALS!
chosen_LastQN: ^Oh, this one you should have known.
^You should have known all these, but you did well enough. You deserve this book.
